translation: Allah tʿālyā sndi nav sintụ̄ yus be antha mhrban th rḥm krn vvl chuh.

Tʿryf chih Allah tʿālyā sndy khạṭr yus tmam kaʿnatuk rb chuh. (svrh fatḥh chih khdayn pnnụ̄ bndh aamhi mvjvb hychhnạvimtụ̄ takh tim krn aath pnnhi ṭrfh ʿrẓy hndis ṣvrts mnz pnnis rbs brvnhh knhi pysh. Āyts mnz yus lfẓ rb chuh vartavnh āmut, yih chuh ʿrby zbạnụ̄ mnz tryn mʿniyan mnz vannh yivan (1) malik th āqa (2) srprst, rachahn vvl, khbr aatr hynh vvl th rạchh ravatth krn vvl (3) frman rva, ḥạkim, mudbir th muntẓm, Allah tʿālyā chuh yimn sarine mʿnhi yan mnz kaʿnatuk rb.
Sytthah mhrban th rḥm krn vvl chuh.
Asụ̄ chih chạny ʿbadt kran th czye chihy mdd mngan. (ʿbadt lfẓ thi chuh ʿrby zbạnụ̄ mnz tryn mʿniyan mnz vartavnh yivan (1) pvuza th prstsh (2) aṭaʿt th frman brdạry (3) bndgy th ghlạmy.

Timn lukn hnz vath yimn cze anʿām frmvvuth, yimn pytth nh ghẓb āv krnh, yim vthi chihnh ddlimtụ̄. (bndh sndi aamy duʿāʿuuk jvab chuh yih pvur qrān. Bndh chuh pnnis rbs rhnmạyy hund drkhvast kran th rb chuhs aamhi kis jvabs mnz yih svrue qrān ʿṭa kran.)
